Extended Description:
Refine your water experience with the **EVOSOFT‚Ñ¢ Prime 32K Grain City Water Softener**: the hallmark of AQUALIVIA craftsmanship for modern urban homes. Designed specifically for **municipal water**, this compact yet powerful system ensures a flawless balance of performance, reliability, and sophistication.
At its core lies **Aldex C-800 10% cross-linked resin**, a premium-grade ion exchange media engineered for exceptional chlorine resistance and long-term durability. This resin delivers superior hardness removal, extending the life of your plumbing, fixtures, and appliances while maintaining the velvety texture of softened water that defines luxury living.
Perfect for **1‚Äì2 occupants** and **one bathroom homes up to 1,000 sq. ft.**, EVOSOFT‚Ñ¢ Prime 32K combines intelligent metered regeneration with quiet operation and sleek design. Its optimized valve system maximizes efficiency, reducing salt and water consumption without compromising performance.
Built for **standard city water pressure (60‚Äì70 PSI)** and backed by a **10-year service life**, this model embodies AQUALIVIA‚Äôs promise of engineering excellence and enduring value. From the first touch of softened water to the final rinse, every moment reflects purity, care, and precision.
Experience the EVOSOFT‚Ñ¢ Prime difference: a water softening solution that performs with intelligence and looks the part of elegance.
Maintenance Requirement:
Add salt as needed
Clean brine tank once per year
Check valve settings every 12 months
Inspect resin for channeling every 3 to 5 years
Replace resin every 10 to 15 years depending on water quality
Estimated Installation Time: A professional water softener installation typically takes 2 to 4 hours, but this can vary depending on the complexity of the job and the type of system. Replacing an existing unit might take less time, sometimes as little as an hour, while a new installation with additional plumbing will take longer.
